nextmap.get.command.info: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}If you want to see what the next map is, say {lime}!nextmap
lastmap.get.command.info: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}If you want to see the last map, say {lime}!lastmap
currentmap.get.command.info: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}If you want to see the current map, say {lime}!currentmap
timeleft.get.command.info: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}If you want to see the time left, say {lime}!timeleft
command.no.perm: [MapInfo] You do not have permission for this command
vote.started: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Voting for the next map has started
vote.finished.extend.map.round: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Voting ended. Current map extended by {lime}{EXTENDED_TIME} rounds
vote.finished.extend.map.timeleft: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Voting ended. Current map extended by {lime}{EXTENDED_TIME} minutes
menu.title.vote: 【 Vote for the next map 】
menu.title.maps: 【 Pick a map to change 】
rtv.too.early: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Rock The Vote is not available yet. Please wait {lime}{TIME} {yellow}seconds
rtv.already.voted: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}You have already voted to change the map
rtv.started: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Rock The Vote has been triggered. Vote for the next map!
rtv.using.nextmap: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Rock The Vote has been triggered. Next map will be {lime}{MAP_NAME}
vote.tie.random: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Vote ended in a tie. Randomly selected: {lime}{MAP_NAME}
vote.ignore.random: {lightpurple}[MapInfo] {yellow}Ignore Vote option won. Selecting a random map.
